    U

    UNIT - 类中的静态变量 org.kelvinizer.constants.ReferenceWindow
    A base unit used for scaling and positioning calculations, typically equal to a single "unit" of the UI grid.
    updateSelectionStrings(JacketMenu, ArrayList<Song>) - 类中的方法 org.kelvinizer.menu.songselection.SongSelectionText
    Updates the song selection screen with the current song's data, including name, composer, level, difficulty, and best scores.
    updateText() - 类中的方法 org.kelvinizer.game.gametext.ChartText
    Updates the text displayed in the chart, including the player's score, accuracy, combo, and counts for different judgement types (Perfect, Good, etc.).
    updateText() - 类中的方法 org.kelvinizer.menu.settingpage.SettingsText
    Updates the content of the text fields based on the current settings page
    user - 类中的变量 org.kelvinizer.menu.SelectionButtons
    The "User" button.
    User - org.kelvinizer.constants中的类
    Represents a user with their settings, game data, and score information.
    User() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.constants.User
    Default constructor that generates a random user name and initializes the user data.
    User(File) - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.constants.User
    Constructor that initializes a User object by reading data from a file.
    User(String) - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.constants.User
    Constructor to create a User object with the specified user name.
    USER - 类中的静态变量 org.kelvinizer.menu.SelectionButtons
    State indicating the user action.
    userData - 类中的变量 org.kelvinizer.constants.User
    A map storing the user's game data, indexed by collection, song, and level.
    userIndex - 类中的静态变量 org.kelvinizer.constants.Control
    Index of the currently active user.
    userName - 类中的变量 org.kelvinizer.constants.User
    The name of the user.
    users - 类中的静态变量 org.kelvinizer.constants.Control
    List of registered users.
    UserSelection - org.kelvinizer.menu.userselection中的类
    Represents the user selection panel where users can select or create profiles and navigate options.
    UserSelection() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.menu.userselection.UserSelection
    Constructs a UserSelection panel, initializing key bindings and setting the initial render index.
    UserSelectionButton - org.kelvinizer.menu.userselection中的类
    Represents the set of buttons used in the user selection panel, including navigation, selection, and level options.
    UserSelectionButton() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.menu.userselection.UserSelectionButton
    Constructs a UserSelectionButton instance and initializes all buttons with their respective configurations.
    UserSelectionText - org.kelvinizer.menu.userselection中的类
    Represents the text information displayed in the user selection menu, including username, total data, cleared data, full combo data, and all perfect data.
    UserSelectionText() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.menu.userselection.UserSelectionText
    Constructs a UserSelectionText instance and initializes the appearance of all text objects.
